p: The binding of EO and ME+EO to membrane ergosterol in C. albicans was evaluated according to the method described by Peixoto et al 28 (2017). Microplates were prepared according to protocol M27-A3, 26 with some modifications. EO and ME+EO were evaluated at concentrations ranging from 5000 μg/mL to 2.44 μg/mL. C. albicans (ATCC 102331 and CAV) suspensions (10 3 cells/mL) were prepared (100 µL) in RPMI 1640 medium supplemented with 200 μg/mL exogenous ergosterol. Medium without exogenous ergosterol was used as a control. Microplates were incubated at 35°C and readings were performed after 2 d.
